localResource.name: VM_multiselect
localResource.label: VM multi-select
localResource.queryString: SELECT distinct delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL then vm_name ELSE vm_name || ' (Removed on ' || cast(delete_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name, vm_id FROM v3_0_vm_configuration_view Where v3_0_vm_configuration_view.cluster_id in (SELECT v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.cluster_id FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE v3_0_cluster_configuration_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid)) AND v3_0_vm_configuration_view.cluster_id = CASE $P{P_Cluster_ID} WHEN '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' then v3_0_vm_configuration_view.cluster_id ELSE cast($P{P_Cluster_ID} as uuid) END AND v3_0_vm_configuration_view.vm_type = CASE cast($P{P_VM_Type} as int) WHEN -1 THEN v3_0_vm_configuration_view.vm_type WHEN NULL THEN v3_0_vm_configuration_view.vm_type ELSE cast($P{P_VM_Type} as int) END AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_vm_configuration_view as a GROUP BY a.vm_id) $P!{Active_VMs} order by delete_date DESC, combo_name
